snippet: In choosing Russ Feingold, Secretary of State John Kerry moved to raise the profile of the Great Lakes region of Africa, which has been torn by conflict but overshadowed by other crises.
abstract: Sec of State John Kerry selects former Senate colleague Russ Feingold, to serve as special envoy to Great Lakes region of Africa; promises to raise the profile of region torn by conflict and yet largely overshadowed in American foreign policy by other global crises.
lead_paragraph: In choosing Russ Feingold, Secretary of State John Kerry moved to raise the profile of the Great Lakes region of Africa, which has been torn by conflict but overshadowed by other crises.

headline.main: Ex-Senator Feingold Chosen as Special Envoy to African Region
headline.print_headline:
Feingold Appointed Special Envoy 
To War-Torn Great Lakes Region
